formula: a(n+2) = 4*(2*n+3)*a(n+1) -(n+1)^2*a(n); a(0)=1, a(1)=4. - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Sep 12 2012a(n) ~ sqrt(2)*n^n/(sqrt(8*sqrt(15)-30)*exp(n)*(4-sqrt(15))^n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 27 2013
maple: a:= n-> n! *coeff(series(1/sqrt(1-8*x+x^2), x, n+1), x, n):seq (a(n), n=0..20);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 12 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
